trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event enables you to customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the details view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트를 사용 하면 사용자 지정 (또는 소유자 그리기)의 모양을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>세부 정보 뷰에서 컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트는에 의해 발생 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>시점을 제어할 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성이로 설정 되어 `true` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> 속성은</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> 해당</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 정보를 포함 하는 이벤트 처리기에 전달 된 DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는 하위 항목을 그릴 수 있도록 하는 메서드도 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> properties to retrieve information about the parent item of the subitem to draw.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A>그릴 하위 항목의 부모 항목에 대 한 정보를 검색할 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 검색 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>자체를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> representing the header of the column in which the subitem is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>검색할 속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>하위 항목 표시 되는 열 머리글을 나타내는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>속성으로 지정 된 영역 내에서 실제 그리기를 수행 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 표준 그릴 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>사용 하 여 사용자 지정 필요 하지 않은 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>속성을 운영 체제를 하위 항목을 그리는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to customize only specific subitems.
trans-unit.target: 특정 하위 항목만 사용자 지정 하려는 경우에 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 그래픽 깜빡임 소유자 그리기를 재정의 하는 경우 문제를 방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>제어 하 고 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능을 응용 프로그램에 Windows XP 및 Windows Server 2003 제품군에 대해서만 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 크기와 위치를 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 지정한 위치가의 왼쪽 위 모퉁이 기준으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 의 범위를 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> 있는 열은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> column within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>내의 열에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current background color.
trans-unit.target: 배경을 그립니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>현재 배경색을 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 현재 값을 사용 하는 표준 배경을 그릴는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 로 지정 된 영역을 채우는 배경을 그릴지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>부모 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>로 설정 해야 `false` 방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>하위 항목 값이 재정의 부모 항목의 값입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>소유자가 그린 대신 운영 체제에서 그려야.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event for subitems that you do not want to customize.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 경우이 속성을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>사용자 지정 하려면 하위 항목에 대 한 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the subitem will be drawn normally using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 하는 경우 `true`, 일반적으로의 현재 값을 사용 하 여 하위 항목을 그려집니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>부모 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>로 설정 해야 `false` 방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>하위 항목 값이 재정의 부모 항목의 값입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the subitem should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>운영 체제;에서 하위 항목을 그려야 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> if the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> has focus.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 포커스 영역을 그립니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>경우 부모 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 포커스가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the subitem.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 하위 항목 주위 표준 포커스 사각형을 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is drawn one pixel inside the area specified by the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 사각형은으로 지정 된 영역 안에 그려지는&1; 픽셀로 `bounds` 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: It is drawn only when the parent item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하기 전에 항목의 포커스 상태를 확인할 필요가 없습니다 부모 항목에 포커스가 있을 때만 그려집니다.

trans-unit.source: You might want to draw the focus rectangle only around the first subitem (that is, the parent item, which is displayed in the first column) rather than drawing it around every subitem of an item.
trans-unit.target: 항목의 모든 하위 항목 주위에 그리는 대신 첫 번째 하위 항목 (즉, 부모 항목, 첫 번째 열에 표시 되는)만 주위에 포커스 영역을 그리는 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the normal behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이것은 일반적인 동작에 해당는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성이로 설정 되어 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw the focus rectangle around the first subitem, call the DrawFocusRectangle method only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 하위 항목 주위에 포커스 영역을 그리려면 DrawFocusRectangle 메서드를 호출 합니다. 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>값은 0입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not provide the ability to select individual subitems, but if you want to implement subitem selection yourself, you can use this method to draw the focus rectangle around a subitem other than the first one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>컨트롤은 개별 하위 항목을 선택할 수 있는 기능을 제공 하지 않지만 하위 항목 선택을 사용자가 직접 구현 하려는 경우 첫 번째 이외의 하위 항목 주위에 포커스 영역을 그리는 데이 방법을 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The area within which to draw the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 사각형을 그릴 영역입니다.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트를 그립니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>현재 전경색을 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여의 현재 값을 사용 하 여 하위 항목 텍스트를 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 으로 지정 된 영역 내에서 텍스트를 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>부모 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>로 설정 해야 `false` 방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>하위 항목 값이 재정의 부모 항목의 값입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트를 그립니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>현재 전경색을 사용 하 여 지정 된 서식 지정 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여의 현재 값을 사용 하 여 하위 항목 텍스트를 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 으로 지정 된 영역 내에서 텍스트를 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>에 지정 된 값은 `flags` 매개 변수를 사용 하면 텍스트 맞춤과 같은 노드 레이블에 대 한 서식 속성을 제공할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>부모 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>로 설정 해야 `false` 방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>하위 항목 값이 재정의 부모 항목의 값입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> 를 그리는 데 사용

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>클래스 속성 및 그리기 디스플레이 장치에 관한 유용한 메서드를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> 를 그리는 데 사용

trans-unit.source: Gets the header of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 헤더를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> 있는 열은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> for the column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> 있는 열에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 부모를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 액세스 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>의 부모는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 이 때 유용는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>속성 요구 사항에 맞게 적절 한 정보를 제공 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>속성만 부모 항목 선택,이 옵션을 선택 되거나 포커스가 있는 결정 하는, 예를 들어 사용할 수 있는 기본 상태 정보를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Item property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: 이 항목은 반면에 액세스할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 부모의 모든 멤버

trans-unit.source: To access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 액세스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>사용 하 여 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 의 부모를 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 부모의 인덱스를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 부모 인덱스 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 내에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 부모의 현재 상태를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 확인 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>의 부모는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>특정 상태에는 그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the parent item.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 부모 항목에 대 한 기본 상태 정보를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: 부모 항목 선택,이 옵션을 선택 또는 초점을 맞춘 확인 하려면 예를 들어이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the parent item through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property and check its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용을 해야 할 경우 통해 부모 항목을 검색는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>속성 및 해당 속성을 직접 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> 부모의 현재 상태를 나타내는 값 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when the other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs> properties do not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 유용 다른 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>속성 요구 사항에 맞게 적절 한 정보를 제공 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The SubItem property allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 하위 항목 속성의 모든 멤버에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그려집니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: You must access this object directly, for example, to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value yourself rather than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 직접 액세스 해야이 개체, 예를 들어 그릴는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>값을 사용 하지 않고 직접는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>
